course_description: This course is a co-requisite for Political Science 100, 110, and 120, and a prerequisite for all other political science courses. Approaches to the study of politics and comparison of political systems, including democratic and authoritarian regimes, within the context of Western civilization.
sections: Class Nbr: 4217, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: TTh 8:30-9:45a, Instructor: J. Auerbach, Status: Open
